author: Staff Reporter
text:
A special Gram Sabha would be convened in all 860 village panchayats in Tiruvannamalai district on Monday (February 22) to decide the list of housing scheme beneficiaries.

Meet to select beneficiaries

Additional houses were allotted to villages under Indira Awaas Yojana for the benefit of those who lost their houses in the north east monsoon this year.

The special Gram Sabha would select the beneficiaries to allot those houses.

The meet would also enlist the houses yet to have toilets in the concerned villages.

Solid waste management plan

Another important agenda for the Gram Sabha is to make public the places of collection of garbage under the village solid waste management plan.
title: Special Gram Sabha convened in 860 village panchayats
